import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Layout from '../components/Layout/Layout'; import './Home.css'; function Home() { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); // Sample slider data const sliderData = [ { id: 1, title: "Excellence in Education", subtitle: "Nurturing young minds for a brighter future", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1523050854058-8df90110c9f1?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1800&q=80" }, { id: 2, title: "Modern Learning Environment", subtitle: "State-of-the-art facilities for optimal learning", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1591123120675-6f7f1aae0e5b?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1800&q=80" }, { id: 3, title: "Building Community", subtitle: "Where students grow together", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1577896851231-70ef18881754?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1800&q=80" } ]; // Auto slide functionality useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => (prevSlide + 1) % sliderData.length); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [sliderData.length]); return (
{/* Hero Slider Section */}
{sliderData.map((slide, index) => (

{slide.title}

{slide.subtitle}

))}
{sliderData.map((_, index) => ( ))}
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome to Our Prestigious School

Where we inspire excellence, nurture potential, and build character. Our dedicated faculty and state-of-the-art facilities provide an environment where students can thrive academically, socially, and personally.

25+

Years of Excellence

2,000+

Happy Students

150+

Qualified Teachers

15+

Acres Campus

{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Our School

Academic Excellence

Our curriculum is designed to challenge students and foster critical thinking skills.

Sports Programs

We offer a wide range of athletic activities to promote physical health and teamwork.

Arts & Culture

Our arts programs encourage creativity and self-expression in various mediums.

Inclusive Community

We celebrate diversity and foster an environment of respect and inclusion.

{/* Poster Section */}

Transforming Education for Tomorrow's Leaders

Our innovative approach to learning prepares students not just for exams, but for life. With cutting-edge technology and proven teaching methodologies, we create an engaging educational experience.

{/* Testimonials Section */}

What Parents & Students Say

"This school has transformed my child's learning experience. The teachers are dedicated and the facilities are exceptional."

Sarah Johnson

Parent of Grade 5 Student

"I've grown so much since joining this school. The supportive environment helped me discover my passion for science."

Michael Chen

Grade 11 Student

"As an educator, I appreciate the school's commitment to innovative teaching methods and student-centered learning."

Dr. Emily Rodriguez

Science Department Head

{/* Call to Action Section */}

Ready to Join Our Community?

Schedule a visit to our campus or begin the application process today.

 ); } export default Home;
